# displayedPerson

**Instance Property**

Specifies a person record whose properties are displayed by the view controller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var displayedPerson: ABRecord { get set }
```

## Discussion

All the properties of `displayedPerson` are displayed by the view controller.

## Displaying Person Properties

- **alternateName**: Provides a value that is displayed instead of the first and last name.
- **message**: Text displayed below [doc://com.apple.addressbookui/documentation/AddressBookUI/ABUnknownPersonViewController/alternateName].
